channel.title: Groovy on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Groovy on Mark Needham

item.title: Coding Dojo #18: Groovy Bowling Game
item.description: This week’s dojo involved coding a familiar problem - the bowling game - in a different language, Groovy. The code we wrote is available on bitbucket. The Format Cam, Dean and I took turns pairing with each other with the code projected onto a TV. As there were only a few of us the discussion on where we were taking the code tended to included everyone rather than just the two at the keyboard.
